block.p: SYMONDS-Edward. On 11th August 2000 suddenly as the result of a bicycle accident. Aged eightyone years of Toller Porcorum, North Dorchester, Dorset, and of New Vernon, NJ USA. Beloved and honoured husband and father. Funeral service will take place at The Toller Porcorum Parish Church on Friday 18th August at 2 pm followed by private cremation. Donations in lieu of flowers for The Friends of the Lake District or Council for the Protection of Rural England, C/O A.J. Wakely & Sons, 91 East Street, Bridport, Dorset DT63LB, U.K.
